author: christopheralanwest
body:
#### PR description:

This PR updates the global tags relevant for the 2017 UL reprocessing, as well as a fix for PPS conditions in prompt-like global tags. An additional commit will be added later to include the final 106X_mc2017_realistic global tag but I am submitting the PR now because the PR comparison tests are a useful cross-check that no changes have been introduced into pre-2017 data workflows.

The changes are as follows:

106X_dataRun2_v14:
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/106X_dataRun2_v14/106X_dataRun2_v13

106X_dataRun2_relval_v13:
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/106X_dataRun2_relval_v13/106X_dataRun2_relval_v12

106X_dataRun2_PromptLike_HEfail_v9:
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/106X_dataRun2_PromptLike_HEfail_v9/106X_dataRun2_PromptLike_HEfail_v8

106X_dataRun2_PromptLike_v10:
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/106X_dataRun2_PromptLike_v10/106X_dataRun2_PromptLike_v9

106X_dataRun2_PromptLike_HI_v10:
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/106X_dataRun2_PromptLike_HI_v10/106X_dataRun2_PromptLike_HI_v9


#### PR validation:

An enormous amount of work went into validating the conditions for this PR. Details can be found at the sign-off talks listed at:

- Data: https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/4163.html
- MC: https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/4159.html

As a technical check, I ran `runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos`

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

This PR is not a backport but a backport will be prepared for 10_6_X.
title: Final global tags for 2017 UL reprocessing
